'''Everlasting Devotion''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Realm of Tranquil Eternity]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 51]].

==Trivia==
* <section begin=KitsuneTheme /> The following soundtracks share a leitmotif:
** [[Her Legacy]]
** [[Everlasting Devotion]]
** [[Kitsune's Mask]]
** [[Hanachirusato (Soundtrack)|Hanachirusato]]
** [[Time to Say Farewell]]
** [[Miko's Night]]
** [[Where the Shirasagi Dances]]
** [[Shirasagi Princess]]
** [[Pathos of Shirasagi]]
** [[Soar in the Wind]]
** [[The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia (Soundtrack)|The Immovable God and the Eternal Euthymia]]
** [[Serene and Fathomless]]
** The melodies shared between these soundtracks was adapted from the song {{zh|"浮生"||zh_tl=Fleeting Life}} that was composed and arranged by Yu-Peng Chen. The song was only made available through the physical release of the 2019 album {{zh|''山止川行''|zh_tl=Mountain Stops, River Goes}}. According to Lu Jintou ({{zh|陆进透}}), the coordinator who worked on the album, Yu-Peng Chen held the copyright to the composition ever since.<ref>Bilibili: [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1dJ411F7JZ/ {{zh|不才个人原创专辑《山止川行》试听pv}}] (Timestamp: 4m 57s)</ref><ref>Bilibili: [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1A44y1b7xZ {{zh|【原神】白鹭归庭BGM出处《浮生》}}]</ref><section end=KitsuneTheme />
